String.Source: Maybe Tiber Septim is Alduin, too.
String.Dest: 很有可能泰伯?赛普丁就是奥杜因。

String.Source: What a bunch of bull-horker! Not even a shape-shifter can be in two places at once! Alduin is more likely one of the Uriels or Pelagiuses.
String.Dest: 它的体积堪比一群雄性海象的集合！仅仅是一次翼展就能遮蔽大片天空！奥杜因简直就是尤瑞尔或者佩拉吉奥斯的化身。

String.Source: Tell me about how you went back in time.
String.Dest: 告诉我你怎么能及时赶回来。

String.Source: Right, so the Moon Elves sent me to the dawn of the 3rd Era.
String.Dest: 对啊, 所以说是月亮精灵把我送到了第三纪元的黎明。

String.Source: Tell me about how you went back in time.
String.Dest: 告诉我你怎么能及时赶回来。

String.Source: It's there that I wrote this book about the Mystery of Talara, whose story came to me in a dream.
String.Dest: It's there that I wrote this book about the Mystery of Talara, whose story came to me in a dream.

String.Source: Tell me about how you went back in time.
String.Dest: 告诉我你怎么能及时赶回来。

String.Source: It's about a princess who lost her identity following a royal murder plot.
String.Dest: 这是有关一位公主如何在一场皇室谋杀的阴谋发生后痛失她的身份与地位的故事。

String.Source: Tell me about how you went back in time.
String.Dest: 告诉我你怎么能及时赶回来。

String.Source: And that's when I realized to avoid assassination, Tiber Septim was secretly living in the Imperial City as a prostitute named Gyna.
String.Dest: 泰伯赛普汀以吉纳的名字秘密入主皇城，从那时起，我意识到需要提防暗杀。

String.Source: I don't think those are vegetables.
String.Dest: 我不认为那些是蔬菜。

String.Source: Sure they are! There's corn, artichokes, and that nightshade-looking thing over there is some kind of Dwarven onion.
String.Dest: 就在这儿！这里有玉米，洋蓟，还有某种和夜茄类似的矮人洋葱。

String.Source: I can deliver your next letter for you.
String.Dest: 我能送下封信给你。

String.Source: And trust such an important message to an amateur? Never. The letter stays in my pocket, until I can find an official courier.
String.Dest: 把这么重要的信件托付给一个外行人？想都别想。我会把这封信留在我自己这儿，直到我找到一个正式的通讯员为止。

String.Source: What exactly is your role as a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你到底在风暴斗篷里扮演什么角色？

String.Source: I send letters to that false queen, Jarl Tullius.
String.Dest: 我寄了封信给那个假女王——图留斯领主。

String.Source: What exactly is your role as a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你到底在风暴斗篷里扮演什么角色？

String.Source: Scathing missives that mock her figure and the vast emptiness that fills the halls of her pink palace.
String.Dest: 尖酸的信件嘲讽着她的体型，巨大的空虚充斥在她的粉色宫殿大厅之中。

String.Source: What exactly is your role as a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你到底在风暴斗篷里扮演什么角色？

String.Source: At the bottom I sometimes scribble drawings of a pornographic nature, just to further illustrate my point.
String.Dest: 在结尾处我有些时候会用笔草草地画上一些自然春光图，只为了能够在未来进一步阐述我的观点。

String.Source: I suppose that's a reasonable criticism.
String.Dest: 我认为那是合理的犯罪。

String.Source: Now Ulfric, that's a strong Nord name. A strong Nord name for a strong Nord man.
String.Dest: 乌弗瑞克，还真是个听着就很强力的诺德名字啊。正是人如其名。

String.Source: I suppose that's a reasonable criticism.
String.Dest: 我认为那是合理的犯罪。

String.Source: Some people even go so far as to say that Ulfric Stormcloak is Talos reborn. That's ridiculous.
String.Dest: 有些人甚至直到现在还认为乌弗瑞克·风暴斗篷是塔洛斯重生。这太荒谬了。

String.Source: I suppose that's a reasonable criticism.
String.Dest: 我认为那是合理的犯罪。

String.Source: Lies perpetuated by plant mages who sniffed one too many deathbells. Ulfric isn't the second coming of Talos. He is Talos.
String.Dest: 就是那些吸多了死亡丧钟的草药术士们让谎言延续至今，蒙蔽了世人。乌弗瑞克不是塔洛斯的转世，他就是塔洛斯。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Now Ulfric, that's a strong Nord name. A strong Nord name for a strong Nord man.
String.Dest: 乌弗瑞克，还真是个听着就很强力的诺德名字啊。正是人如其名。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Some people even go so far as to say that Ulfric Stormcloak is Talos reborn. That's ridiculous.
String.Dest: 有些人甚至直到现在还认为乌弗瑞克·风暴斗篷是塔洛斯重生。这太荒谬了。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Lies perpetuated by plant mages who sniffed one too many deathbells. Ulfric isn't the second coming of Talos. He is Talos.
String.Dest: 就是那些吸多了死亡丧钟的草药术士们让谎言延续至今，蒙蔽了世人。乌弗瑞克不是塔洛斯的转世，他就是塔洛斯。

String.Source: You're a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你是风暴斗篷的一员？

String.Source: Of course! Not officially, but I follow the one true king of Skyrim. Not that harlot widow, whats-her-face, General Tullius.
String.Dest: 当然！虽然不被承认，但我只追随天际省真正的至高王。才不是那婊子寡妇，她叫什么名字？将军·图留斯是吧。

String.Source: You're a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你是风暴斗篷的一员？

String.Source: What kind of name is that for a Jarl? Or a woman? General.
String.Dest: 这还能叫领主的名字吗？这还能叫女人的名字吗？居然还有叫"将军"的人。

String.Source: You're a Stormcloak?
String.Dest: 你是风暴斗篷的一员？

String.Source: Sounds like something I'd name a store, or the assortment of crap that collects under my foot.
String.Dest: 这听起来简直就是商店的名字嘛，就像我脚下这垃圾堆一样垃圾。

String.Source: That doesn't explain how he became Jarl of Windhelm.
String.Dest: 这并不能解释他是如何成为风盔城贵族的。

String.Source: Oh, but it does. You see, Tiber Septim is a shape-shifter. He is no man, and every man at once.
String.Dest: 哦。但确实如此，你看，泰伯塞普汀是一个变种人。这一刻他不是人类，不再是任何一个人。

String.Source: That doesn't explain how he became Jarl of Windhelm.
String.Dest: 这并不能解释他是如何成为风盔城贵族的。

String.Source: Some even think it was he who seduced Barenziah as the battlemage Jagar Tharn.
String.Dest: 有些人甚至认为是他引诱巴兰兹娅成为了战斗法师贾加·萨恩。

String.Source: That doesn't explain how he became Jarl of Windhelm.
String.Dest: 这并不能解释他是如何成为风盔城贵族的。

String.Source: Which is a bunch of chicken feathers. Another thing dreamt up by mages who need courage spells to confront the fact they're all miserable failures!
String.Dest: 那只是一堆鸡毛。是被那些法师空想出来的东西。那些法师一无是处，甚至需要施展勇气魔法才能面对这个事实。

String.Source: Anyways, you were saying about Ulfric?
String.Dest: 总之，你是在说乌弗瑞克吗？

String.Source: Huh? What was I saying?
String.Dest: 哈？我刚才说了啥？

String.Source: A man your age must have some family to speak of.
String.Dest: 像你这样年纪的男人通常会谈及家人。

String.Source: Haven't you been paying attention to a word I've said? The Stormcloaks are my family.
String.Dest: 你没注意到我说的话吗？我的家人就是风暴斗篷。

String.Source: A man your age must have some family to speak of.
String.Dest: 像你这样年纪的男人通常会谈及家人。

String.Source: I had a father once, Thornvar the Hammer. People used to say he must've took a hammer to the head.
String.Dest: 我父亲活着的时候，被称作铁锤琮瓦。人们常说他脑袋肯定是被锤子敲过。

String.Source: A man your age must have some family to speak of.
String.Dest: 像你这样年纪的男人通常会谈及家人。

String.Source: Or spent his days at the docks, hammering down bottles of skooma. Nobody says that about me. I'm not mad.
String.Dest: 或在码头上度过时日，锤击着斯库玛的瓶子。但没人这样说我。我没有发疯。

String.Source: Ulfric is Talos?
String.Dest: 不好意思，你说什么？

String.Source: That's right. Tiber Septim has been in hiding ever since he faked his death in the 38th year of the 3rd Era. I can prove it. I was there.
String.Dest: 那就对了。泰伯·赛普汀从第三纪元三十八年假死开始一直隐藏到现在。我能证明。我当时就在现场。

String.Source: I'm not sure Elder Scrolls work that way.
String.Dest: 我不确定上古卷轴是那样用的。

String.Source: Why, have you ever used one? Ever even seen one?
String.Dest: 你为什么会那样觉得...你用过上古卷轴吗？还是说曾见到过它？

String.Source: I'm not sure Elder Scrolls work that way.
String.Dest: 我不确定上古卷轴是那样用的。

String.Source: I've got three in my pocket, and six more that I plan on designing myself using charcoal and paper made from the Eldergleam.
String.Dest: 我口袋里就有三个卷轴，另外还有六个我打算用从古藤圣所取来的木炭和纸自己制作呢。

String.Source: Alright, that explains the face, but shape-shifters aren't immortal.
String.Dest: 好吧，这解释了表面，但变身状态并非不道德。

String.Source: But Vampires are. That's right, Ulfric Stormcloak is actually Tiber Septim, a shape-shifting vampire.
String.Dest: 但他是个吸血鬼。对，乌佛瑞克·暴风斗篷确实是个吸血鬼。他吸的是金币，他是个变种的吸血鬼。

String.Source: Alright, that explains the face, but shape-shifters aren't immortal.
String.Dest: 好吧，这解释了表面，但变身状态并非不道德。

String.Source: Remember that the next time you visit the Palace of the Kings.
String.Dest: 下次再来拜访众王之殿的时候给我记住这一点。

String.Source: Why yes, yes I am.
String.Dest: 是啊，就是我。

String.Source: I knew it. And here I was about to tell you my name is Godrod the Hammer, greatest Son of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我知道。我刚想告诉你我的名字就是铁锤葛卓，天际儿女中最伟大的那个。

String.Source: Hello again.
String.Dest: 又见面啦！

String.Source: Haven't we met before? Wait...you're that Imperial agent I keep telling myself about!
String.Dest: 我们以前是不是见过？等等...你是那个我一直提防着的帝国密探！！

String.Source: Of course! I was a fool not to see it myself.
String.Dest: 当然！我真是个傻瓜，竟然没看见。

String.Source: We all were, we all were. Tiber Septim, you see, is what you call a shape-shifter.
String.Dest: 我们都是，我们都是。你看，泰伯赛普丁就是所谓的易形者。

String.Source: Of course! I was a fool not to see it myself.
String.Dest: 当然！我真是个傻瓜，竟然没看见。

String.Source: Not some illusionist like Jagar Tharn, but a real shape-shifter, the kind that can transform into a dragon or a bale of hay.
String.Dest: 不是某些像贾格•萨恩一样的幻术师，而是那种能够变成一头龙或一捆干草的真正变形者。

String.Source: Greetings and salutations, my name is...wait a minute...are you an Imperial agent?
String.Dest: 向你致敬，我的名字是...等等...你是个帝国密探？

String.Source: Are you implying you're hundreds of years old?
String.Dest: 你是在暗示你已经几百岁了么？

String.Source: What? Have you been sticking fire salts up your ass? Well you shouldn't. Sure, it feels good, but it'll give you the meanest rash.
String.Dest: 什么？你一直把火盐贴到你的屁股上？呃，你没那么做。当然，这感觉不错，但也会让你患上最坏的皮疹。

String.Source: Are you implying you're hundreds of years old?
String.Dest: 你是在暗示你已经几百岁了么？

String.Source: Not that that'll stop children from doing it. Children are the worst breed of fungus. I should know, I used to own one.
String.Dest: 这都没法让这些孩子不做这事儿。熊孩子是最难种的蘑菇。我早该知道的，我也曾养过一个。

String.Source: Who used to live here?
String.Dest: 谁曾经住在这里？

String.Source: Some plant mage. Probably wasn't a very good one either, using a stove for an alchemy table.
String.Dest: 某些处男法师。半桶水的那种, 用炉子当炼金台.

String.Source: But in the story, Gyna wasn't actually Princess Talara. That's the twist.
String.Dest: 但在这个故事中，实际上吉纳并不是塔拉让公主。这是扭曲事实。

String.Source: Just like the real Gyna isn't actually the Jarl of Windhelm. She's Tiber Septim, Ulfric's cousin, first emperor of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 就好像真正的吉纳不是风舵城实际上的领主。她是泰伯·赛普汀，乌佛瑞克的堂姐，泰姆瑞尔大陆的第一个统治者。

String.Source: What do you think?
String.Dest: 你觉得怎样？

String.Source: I think you're answering a question with another question in an attempt to confuse me. I think it's working.
String.Dest: I think you're answering a question with another question in an attempt to confuse me. I think it's working.

String.Source: What do you think?
String.Dest: 你觉得怎样？

String.Source: Only an Imperial agent would be so cunning. Which is surprising because they're normally so stupid.
String.Dest: 只有帝国密探才会如此狡猾。这也太奇怪了，他们不都很蠢吗。

String.Source: What do you think?
String.Dest: 你觉得怎样？

String.Source: Well, two can play at that game. So can three. Pretty much any number less than twelve.
String.Dest: 嗯，两个人可以玩这个游戏。三个也行。只要不多于十二个人，都可以。

String.Source: I'm sure the Empire will crumble under the weight of your letters. Literally.
String.Dest: 不夸张的说，我确定帝国会在你的来信之下崩溃。

String.Source: What do you mean by that, literally? Paper can't beat stone. Don't be stupid.
String.Dest: 你这是什么意思，字面上的意思？纸可赢不了石头。别犯傻了。

String.Source: That I was crazy to imply you're hundreds of years old.
String.Dest: 我真是疯了才会暗示你有好几百岁了。

String.Source: Oh right. Like I said, you ought to get your eyes checked. I'm not a day over twenty. What happened is, I got my hand on this thing.
String.Dest: 噢是啊。我说过的，你这眼神儿该去检查一下了。我的20岁还没超过一天呢。现在呢，我正全神贯注在这件东西上呢。

String.Source: That I was crazy to imply you're hundreds of years old.
String.Dest: 我真是疯了才会暗示你有好几百岁了。

String.Source: It's called an Elder Scroll. And I used it to travel to another dimension, where they had invented time travel and something called "a centaur."
String.Dest: 这是上古卷轴。我曾经去过另一个位面，在那儿他们发明了时间旅行和一种叫做"半人马"的玩意儿。

String.Source: That I was crazy to imply you're hundreds of years old.
String.Dest: 我真是疯了才会暗示你有好几百岁了。

String.Source: I think it's a like a Minotaur, with the head of a Centurion.
String.Dest: 我觉得它像一个长着百夫长头的神兽。

String.Source: As a matter of fact...I'm not.
String.Dest: 大致上……我不是。

String.Source: That's exactly what an Imperial slug would say! You're the second patrol to come here in the last week. My letters must be working.
String.Dest: 果然是帝国狗腿子说的屁话！你是这周之内第二批来这儿的巡查。看来我写的信起作用了。

String.Source: As a matter of fact...I'm not.
String.Dest: 大致上……我不是。

String.Source: The last guy was shaking in his stupid red dress saying something like I was more valuable to the cause alive.
String.Dest: 上一个家伙在他那可笑的红衣服里面发抖，说着"您定能将革命火种洒遍全天际"这类话。

String.Source: As a matter of fact...I'm not.
String.Dest: 大致上……我不是。

String.Source: And he's right! I'm the most valuable soldier in the whole Stormcloak army.
String.Dest: 他说得太对了！我就是整个风暴斗篷军队里最有价值的士兵。

String.Source: I've heard enough from you.
String.Dest: 我已经受够你了。

String.Source: Got what you needed, did you, you Imperial agent? Too bad for you, the Moon Elves taught me a spell that will erase your memory!
String.Dest: 已经得到了你想要的，对不？你个帝国密探？不幸的是，月亮精灵教会我了一个能抹去你记忆的咒语！

String.Source: I've heard enough from you.
String.Dest: 我已经受够你了。

String.Source: All I have to do is look into your eyes and...wait for it...waaait for it...there!
String.Dest: 我需要做的就是看着你的眼睛...等...等啊等啊等啊等...在那里！

String.Source: Actually Centaurs are quite common in the West.
String.Dest: 半人马在西部真的很常见。

String.Source: What? Then it's already begun.
String.Dest: 什么？那这已经开始了。

String.Source: I'd say you look a few days over twenty. And by few I mean a million.
String.Dest: 你看上去也就二十出头的样子，我说的出头呢也就出个上百万天吧。

String.Source: Why? Because of my gray beard? My wrinkles? My age spots? Those aren't indicators of age, but rather a man's grooming habits. Mine are impeccable.
String.Dest: 为什么？因为我那已经灰白的胡须？我的皱纹？我的老年斑？这些并不代表着衰老，只是一个人的修饰品味罢了，我的可是无懈可击的。

String.Source: Wait, go back. There are Elves on the moon?
String.Dest: 等等，回来。在月亮上真有精灵？

String.Source: You better believe it! They live on the sun, the moons, and even...inside you. Ever have a sore throat?
String.Dest: 你最好相信它！他们活在太阳里，月亮里，甚至是...你的身体里。你喉咙疼过吗？

String.Source: Wait, go back. There are Elves on the moon?
String.Dest: 等等，回来。在月亮上真有精灵？

String.Source: That's Elves, taking root like a creep cluster. Elves can live in any climate, on account they aren't actually Elves, but Shades.
String.Dest: 精灵族都那样，殖民的本事跟藤蔓丛一样强。他们什么气候都能生存，因为他们不是真的精灵，而是阴影。

String.Source: Wait, go back. There are Elves on the moon?
String.Dest: 等等，回来。在月亮上真有精灵？

String.Source: They're the ones who taught Tiber Septim the art of shape-shifting.
String.Dest: 他们便是授予泰伯‧赛普汀吼声之道的人。

String.Source: Do you own this shack?
String.Dest: 这间小屋是你的吗？

String.Source: This dump? Are you out of your mind? I just sleep here, live here, and use the vegetable garden on occasion. No, this all belongs to someone else.
String.Dest: 这个仓库？你疯了吗？我只是睡在这里，住在这里，有时用用这里的菜园。没错，这一切都属于别人。

String.Source: Where will you go?
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？

String.Source: I said I'd let him move back in, I didn't say I was moving out. I'll let him sleep on the chair out back, unless he snores. Then it's the axe.
String.Dest: 我说我会让他搬回来，我没说我要搬出去。如果他打呼噜的话，我会让他睡在室外房子后面的椅子上。然后就是斧子的事了。

String.Source: Where will you go?
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？

String.Source: There's a war going on, and I have letters to write. I don't have time to be civil to someone who bays like a horse every time he takes a nap.
String.Dest: 泰姆瑞尔战火四起，我有许多东西要写。我可没有这个闲功夫专门每次在某人打盹的时候像匹马那样嘶叫。

String.Source: I'll be more careful when I sit on a bale of hay then. It might be a Divine.
String.Dest: 对天发誓，坐拥这么一大摊财宝我肯定会更小心的。

String.Source: And blow their cover? You really are bad at this.
String.Dest: 然后揭穿圣灵们的伪装？你对这个真是不在行。

String.Source: Actually, I think the outcome of the war is pretty much decided.
String.Dest: 其实我觉得，这场战争的结果已经差不多确定了。

String.Source: Of course it is! That just shows my letters are working.
String.Dest: 当然是的！它证明了我的信管用了。

String.Source: What if the owner comes back?
String.Dest: 如果那个主人回来了该怎么办？

String.Source: I'll let him move back in.
String.Dest: 我会让他搬回来住的。

String.Source: I want to go back to what you said about Ulfric.
String.Dest: 我想回到你刚刚谈乌佛瑞克的话题。

String.Source: You mean Talos?
String.Dest: 你是说塔洛斯？

String.Source: That's a surprisingly dignified response.
String.Dest: 这种【庄严的回应】真是令人惊讶。

String.Source: What's so surprising about it? I've got dignity frothing out of my tunic. And before you go there, I'm not talking about the stains.
String.Dest: What's so surprising about it? I've got dignity frothing out of my tunic. And before you go there, I'm not talking about the stains.

String.Source: That's a surprisingly dignified response.
String.Dest: 这种【庄严的回应】真是令人惊讶。

String.Source: Or maybe I am. I'm a Son of Skyrim. Even our bowel movements are majestic.
String.Dest: 又或许我是。我是天际之子。连我们的五脏六腑都是高贵的。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。
